objects.name: NCSC
objects.description: The primary organization that authored or published this report.

objects.name: Pygmy Goat libsophos.so path
objects.description: Path where the malicious libsophos.so is copied to.

objects.name: Pygmy Goat IPC Unix server socket
objects.description: Path to the IPC Unix server socket used by Pygmy Goat.

objects.name: Pygmy Goat IPC Unix client socket
objects.description: Path to the IPC Unix client socket used by Pygmy Goat.

objects.name: Pygmy Goat single instance pid file
objects.description: Path to the pid file used by Pygmy Goat to ensure a single instance.

objects.name: Pygmy Goat SSH protocol magic bytes
objects.description: SSH protocol version magic bytes used by Pygmy Goat to identify backdoor SSH connections.

objects.name: Pygmy Goat AES IV
objects.description: AES IV used for decrypting ICMP packets.

objects.name: Pygmy Goat AES key
objects.description: AES key used for decrypting ICMP packets.

objects.name: Pygmy Goat magic validation bytes
objects.description: Magic validation bytes used to verify the decrypted ICMP packet data.

objects.name: Indicator for Pygmy Goat libsophos.so MD5 (MD5)
objects.description: MD5 hash of the malicious libsophos.so shared object.

objects.name: Indicator for Pygmy Goat libsophos.so SHA-1 (SHA1)
objects.description: SHA-1 hash of the malicious libsophos.so shared object.

objects.name: Indicator for Pygmy Goat libsophos.so SHA-256 (SHA256)
objects.description: SHA-256 hash of the malicious libsophos.so shared object.

objects.name: Indicator for Pygmy Goat libsophos.so (older variant) MD5 (MD5)
objects.description: MD5 hash of an older variant of the malicious libsophos.so shared object.

objects.name: Indicator for Pygmy Goat libsophos.so (older variant) SHA-1 (SHA1)
objects.description: SHA-1 hash of an older variant of the malicious libsophos.so shared object.

objects.name: Indicator for Pygmy Goat libsophos.so (older variant) SHA-256 (SHA256)
objects.description: SHA-256 hash of an older variant of the malicious libsophos.so shared object.

objects.name: pygmy goat
objects.description: A native x86-32 ELF shared object that was discovered on Sophos XG firewall devices, providing backdoor access to the device.

objects.name: Fortinet
objects.description: A network device vendor, mentioned in the context of the embedded Root CA Certificate in Pygmy Goat.

objects.name: Mandiant
objects.description: Mentioned in the report for their previous reporting on similar TTPs used by threat actors.

objects.name: Pygmy Goat
objects.description: Not a traditional threat actor, but rather the name of the malware. However, the report mentions CASTLETAP, a threat actor with similar TTPs.

objects.name: CVE-2021-44228
objects.description: Not directly mentioned in the report, but the report format suggests it could be relevant. However, there's no direct exploitation description.

objects.name: pygmy_goat_aes_key
objects.description: YARA rule to detect related activity.
objects.pattern: rule pygmy_goat_aes_key { meta: author = "NCSC" description = "Pygmy Goat AES key built on the stack or in data" date = "2024-11-07" hash1 = "71f70d61af00542b2e9ad64abd2dda7e437536ff" strings: $dword_1 = { 59 4b 6e 77 } $dword_2 = { 51 6a 6d 41 } $dword_3 = { 54 62 41 6e } $dword_4 = { 52 6f 5a 6d } $dword_5 = { 30 66 47 37 } $dword_6 = { 55 5a 57 62 } $dword_7 = { 32 59 55 78 } $dword_8 = { 55 51 50 77 } condition: (uint32(0) == 0x464c457f) and filesize < 5MB and all of them }

objects.name: pygmy_goat_magic_strings
objects.description: YARA rule to detect related activity.
objects.pattern: rule pygmy_goat_magic_strings { meta: author = "NCSC" description = "Pygmy Goat magic byte sequences used in C2 comms" date = "2024-10-22" hash1 = "71f70d61af00542b2e9ad64abd2dda7e437536ff" strings: $c2_magic_handshake = ",bEB3?=o" $fake_ssh_banner = "SSH-2.0-D8pjE" $fake_ed25519_key = { 29 cc f0 cc 16 c5 46 6e 52 19 82 8e 86 65 42 8c 1f 1a d4 c3 a5 b1 cb fc c0 26 6c 31 3c 5c 90 3a 24 7d e4 d3 57 6d da 8e cb f4 66 d1 cb 81 4f 63 fd 4a fa 06 e4 7e 4c a0 95 91 bd cb 97 a4 b3 0f } condition: (uint32(0) == 0x464c457f) and any of them }

objects.name: earthworm_id_generation_x86
objects.description: YARA rule to detect related activity.
objects.pattern: rule earthworm_id_generation_x86 { meta: author = "NCSC" description = "EarthWorm pool num generation x86 assembly" date = "2024-10-22" hash1 = "71f70d61af00542b2e9ad64abd2dda7e437536ff" strings: $chartoi = { 8b 45 ?? // MOV c1 e0 07 // SHL 89 c1 // MOV 8b 55 ?? // MOV 8b 45 ?? // MOV 01 d0 // ADD 0f b6 00 // MOVZX 0f be c0 // MOVSX 01 c8 // ADD 89 45 ?? // MOV 83 6d ?? 01 // SUB } condition: (uint32(0) == 0x464c457f) and all of them }

objects.name: Dynamic Linker Hijacking
objects.description: Pygmy Goat uses the LD_PRELOAD environment variable to inject into sshd.

objects.name: Command and Scripting Interpreter: Unix Shell
objects.description: Pygmy Goat can create a /bin/sh or /bin/csh remote shell.

objects.name: Scheduled Task/Job: Cron
objects.description: Pygmy Goat can create arbitrary cron tasks using crontab.

objects.name: Inter-Process Communication
objects.description: Pygmy Goat uses Unix sockets for inter-process communication between parent and forked child processes.

objects.name: Network Sniffing
objects.description: Pygmy Goat can use libpcap to sniff network traffic according to a BPF filter and exfiltrate it to the C2.

objects.name: Traffic Signaling: Port Knocking
objects.description: Pygmy Goat listens on an ICMP raw socket for encrypted packets containing magic bytes and the C2 address to connect back to.

objects.name: Data Obfuscation: Protocol Impersonation
objects.description: Pygmy Goat responds to an SSH connection that sends magic bytes with a fake SSH handshake.

objects.name: Encrypted Channel: Asymmetric Cryptography
objects.description: Pygmy Goat encrypts C2 communications with TLS.

objects.name: Protocol Tunneling
objects.description: Pygmy Goat can create a reverse SOCKS5 proxy server to tunnel traffic through it.

objects.name: Archive Collected Data: Archive via Library
objects.description: Pygmy Goat compresses its C2 communications with LZO1X.

objects.name: Exfiltration Over C2 Channel
objects.description: Pygmy Goat exfiltrates its result data over its C2 channel.

objects.name: Analisi Malware: Pygmy Goat
objects.description: This report contains technical analysis and indicators associated with malware. pygmy goat.
